elements.text: You are celebrating your daughter's birthday, and the celebration is going on longer than planned. You are worried you won't make it back home in time to take your medication. The event is nowhere close to ending, and you realize your medication is wearing off as you start to feel...

elements.name: Missing Medication_Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
